text:
i need help folks;
after i did build Apache_2.0.54 following the right instructions on AIX 5.3 
every thing was ok, but when i did build mod_jk.so and add it as Include to 
the last line of httpd.conf. now when i try to start apache i get this error


(gdb) r -DONE_PROCESS
Starting program: /opt/vendor/Apache-2.0.54/bin/httpd -DONE_PROCESS

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0xd1da97c8 in ap_hook_handler () from /opt/vendor/Apache-
2.0.54/modules/mod_jk.so
creator: moe2266us@yahoo.com
trawick@apache.org
text:
Does Apache load its own DSOs successfully, or did you build all Apache modules
statically?  (curious if there is a general DSO-loading issue, or if there is
something odd about the mod_jk build which makes it incompatible)
no, i only build mod_jk.so, Apache does the rest
creator: moe2266us@yahoo.com

text:
Run 
  http://people.apache.org/~trawick/cantloaddso.pl
and submit the output to this bug report.  That will check for some symbol
resolution problems.  Maybe it will offer a clue.

Example: cantloaddso.pl /home/joeuser/mod_jk.so /usr/local/apache2
creator: trawick@apache.org
